long_description: Well-suited for beginning trail riding, the Marin Pioneer Trail hardtail mountain bike offers plenty of stable performance for bumpy trails at a great value. 6061 double-butted aluminum frame provides a stiff, responsive ride; hydroformed top and down tubes increase strength and improve handling. SR Suntour XCT suspension fork offers up 100mm of silky travel, taking the jolts out of rough trails; fork can be locked out for more efficient climbing. Shimano triple crankset and Shimano HG31 11-32 cassette offer plenty of gear combinations to get you up hills and down the trail without complaints. Shimano trigger shifters and derailleurs move the chain quickly and easily through all 24 gear combinations. Linear-pull brakes provide solid stopping power for confidence on the trail. Schwalbe Black Jack 26x2.0 in. tires provide good grip whether you're riding in mud or climbing a dusty trail. Specs on the Marin Pioneer Trail hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
